```{r}
library(readr)
collegeData <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/103_student.csv")
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
mutate(
  collegeData,
  學校代碼=as.factor(學校代碼),
  學校名稱=as.factor(學校名稱)
  ) -> collegeData2
collegeData2
```

```{r}
library(readr)
libraryData <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/library100_102.csv")
```

```{r}
libraryData$書籍館藏地 %>% as.factor %>% levels -> storageLocations
storageLocations
```

```{r}
i<-1
# 1
storageLocation_i <- storageLocations[i] 
# 2
numericalIndexForSubsample<-which(libraryData$書籍館藏地==storageLocation_i)
subsample_i <- libraryData[numericalIndexForSubsample,]
# 3
borrowCount_i <- nrow(subsample_i)
```
